snippet: Leslie Cohen Berlowitz, president of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, requested time away from her day-to-day responsibilities during an  inquiry into charges that she had falsely claimed to hold a doctoral degree.
abstract: Leslie Cohen Berlowitz, president of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, requests time away from her day-to-day responsibilities during an inquiry into charges that she had falsely claimed to hold a doctoral degree.
lead_paragraph: Leslie Cohen Berlowitz, president of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, requested time away from her day-to-day responsibilities during an  inquiry into charges that she had falsely claimed to hold a doctoral degree.
